Sentencas: Solid oxide cells (SOCs) have important applications as fuel cells and electrolyzers.
Titulo: Tuning electrochemical and transport processes to achieve extreme performance and efficiency in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The application for storage of renewable electricity is also becoming increasingly relevant; however, it is difficult to meet stringent area-specific resistance (ASR) and long-term stability targets needed to achieve required efficiency and cost.
Titulo: Tuning electrochemical and transport processes to achieve extreme performance and efficiency in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Here we show a new SOC that utilizes a very thin Gd-doped ceria (GDC)/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) bi-layer electrolyte, Ni-YSZ cell support with enhanced porosity, and electrode surface modification using PrO(x)and GDC nanocatalysts to achieve unprecedented low ASR values < 0.1 omega cm(2), fuel cell power density similar to 3 W cm(-2), and electrolysis current density similar to 4 A cm(-2)at 800 degrees C. Besides this exceptionally high performance, fuel cell and electrolysis life tests suggest very promising stability in fuel cell and steam electrolysis modes.
Titulo: Tuning electrochemical and transport processes to achieve extreme performance and efficiency in solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy analysis done using a novel impedance subtraction method shows how rate-limiting electrode processes are impacted by the new SOC materials and design.
Titulo: Tuning electrochemical and transport processes to achieve extreme performance and efficiency in solid oxide cells
